description: ISBN-13 of the book. There may be multiple ISBNs separated by space. That's why it is written as a string.
name: isbn

description: Authors of the book. Separated by ';' or ','. Can be written as 'Surname, First_name' or 'First_name Surname'.
name: authors

description: Number of pages of the book.
name: pages

description: Language(s) of the book. A book may have multiple languages, written in different ways (i.e. Deutsch, German, de, Deutschland). Can also have subjects inside. Separated by '/', ';', and ','.
name: language

description: Keywords for the book. Separated by ';'.
name: keywords

description: The year of publication of the book.
name: year_of_publication

description: Date and time of book's record entry (format dd/M/yy HH:mm).
name: added_on_date

description: URL of the content of the book.
name: full_text

description: Type of content. Can be 'book' or 'chapter'.
name: type
